subject: Sourceforge tracker reconfiguration
msgSnippet: All, The sourceforge tracker for junit (https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=15278) used to have four categories, Bugs, Feature Requests, Support
messageBody:
All,

The sourceforge tracker for junit
(https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=15278) used to have four
categories, Bugs, Feature Requests, Support Requests, and Patches.
I've closed Patches and Support Requests, and moved all their items
into the other categories. This is a useful simplification. Support
Requests were almost never used, and having a separate Patches
category could give the impression that we didn't value patches for
bugs and feature requests that didn't already have them, while also
obscuring which patches fixed bugs and which added new features.

If you believe that any of the items were moved to the wrong
categories, please comment there-upon. Thanks,

David Saff
